Hey, I'm Jonathan.

Welcome to my portfolio!

My background is in computer science and statistics. I am currently pursuing my PhD at Harvard University with an interest in semi-competing risks and modeling of cost data. In the future, I want to work on designing and developing new methods for clinical trials.
